mapper.select: SELECT b.INFO_NO, b.INFO_TITLE, b.INFO_CONTENT, b.INFO_WRITER, b.INFO_IMAGE FROM INFO_FAVORITE f, INFO_BOARD b WHERE f.FA_BD_NO = b.INFO_NO AND f.FA_MB_ID = #{mbid} ORDER BY FA_BD_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM GUIDE_BOARD GB, GUIDE_FAVORITE GF WHERE GB.GUI_NO = GF.FA_BD_NO AND GF.FA_MB_ID = #{mbid} ORDER BY FA_BD_NO DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GUIDE_FAVORITE WHERE FA_MB_ID = #{fa_mb_id} AND FA_BD_NO = #{fa_bd_no}
mapper.select: SELECT M.MB_NAME, M.MB_PHONE, P.DEPARTURE_DATE, P.TRAVEL_NUM, P.PRICE, P.PAY_DATE, GB.GUI_TITLE, GB.GUI_NO, P.GUIDE_ID, P.PAY_NO FROM PAYMENT P, GUIDE_BOARD GB, MEMBER M WHERE P.GUI_NO = GB.GUI_NO AND P.GUIDE_ID = M.MB_ID AND P.PAY_ID = #{id}

SELECT M.MB_NAME, M.MB_PHONE, P.DEPARTURE_DATE, P.TRAVEL_NUM, P.PRICE, P.PAY_DATE, GB.GUI_TITLE, GB.GUI_NO, MC.MAT_NO FROM PAYMENT P, GUIDE_BOARD GB, MEMBER M, MATCHING MC WHERE P.GUI_NO = GB.GUI_NO AND P.PAY_ID = M.MB_ID AND P.PAY_ID = MC.MAT_MB_ID AND P.GUIDE_ID = #{id} AND P.PAID = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM INFO_BOARD WHERE INFO_WRITER = #{id} ORDER BY INFO_NO DESC
